info.author: Eldarion
info.description:
============
django-teams
============

A Django app to support teams of users. This app implements the ideas
mentioned in our blog post, `If Your Website is for Teams, Implement
Organizations`_

.. _If Your Website is for Teams, Implement Organizations: http://eldarion.com/blog/2011/11/16/if-your-website-teams-implement-organizations/


Commercial Support
------------------

This app, and many others like it, have been built in support of many of
Eldarion's own sites, and sites of our clients. We would love to help you on
your next project so get in touch by dropping us a note at info@eldarion.com.
info.name: django-teams
info.summary: a Django app for teams of users
